articles.author: Joby Warrick, Michael Birnbaum, Emily Rauhala
articles.title: Trump's NATO-bashing comments rile allies, rekindle European fears - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump has long railed against European freeloaders, but the claim at a weekend campaign rally in South Carolina was provocative even by his standards.
articles.content: Former president Donald Trumps claim that he would encourage Russia to attack U.S. allies if they failed to spend enough on their defense pact set off fresh tremors Sunday across Washington and in Eu… [+11522 chars]
